landing.title: Full-stack engineer building calm, reliable products
landing.body: I'm a 25-year-old with six years in IT, helping founders launch Laravel APIs, Filament admin tools, and Vue 3 frontends without drama.

home.title: I bring clarity, ship code, and leave teams faster than before.
home.body: From fintech dashboards to creator platforms, I scope the roadmap, design the stack, and carry releases across the finish line.

cards.title: Clarity first
cards.copy: Stakeholder interviews, metrics, and constraints turn vague goals into a backlog we can execute.

cards.title: Laravel + Vue focus
cards.copy: REST APIs, Filament/Livewire back offices, and Vue 3 frontends with strong typing, tests, and monitoring.

cards.title: Operational hand-off
cards.copy: CI/CD, docs, and knowledge transfer so the product keeps evolving after I leave.

about.title: Hi, I'm Roman Suvorov — 25 y/o full-stack engineer.
about.body: I wrote my first production PHP at 19 and spent the last six years shipping internal tools, marketing sites, and data products for small teams.
about.approachBody: Blend discovery sprints with short shipping cycles, keep stakeholders in the loop, and document every technical decision along the way.
principles: Design systems, APIs, and tooling as shared assets.
Automate deploys and tests to stay focused on product value.

tiles.title: Product-minded engineering
tiles.copy: I translate business constraints into architecture, ensuring every line of code ladders up to a metric.

tiles.title: End-to-end ownership

tiles.title: Transparent collaboration
